welcome.title: Welcome to BookForge AI
welcome.description: Where you become masters of Amazon KDP. Your AI assistant for self-publishing on Amazon KDP. From topic research to the final PDF, we're with you every step of the way.
welcome.promptNewProjectName: Enter a name for your new project:
welcome.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the project "{title}"?

researchTab.title: Topic Research
researchTab.description: Enter a topic for your book to start the AI-powered research. We will analyze the market, suggest titles, and find relevant keywords for KDP.
researchTab.loading: Researching... This may take a moment.
researchTab.error: An error occurred during research. Please try again.
researchTab.errorRateLimit: Requests have been temporarily limited. Please wait a minute and try again.

structureTab.title: Book Structure
structureTab.description: Generate a logical structure for your book, including chapters and subchapters. You can edit the structure before proceeding.
structureTab.error: Could not generate a structure. Please ensure you have completed the research step.
structureTab.confirmDeleteChapter: Are you sure you want to delete this chapter and all its subchapters?
structureTab.unsavedChanges: Generating a new structure will overwrite the current one. Continue?

contentTab.title: Content Creation
contentTab.description: Select a chapter or subchapter from the list to write or generate its content with AI assistance.
contentTab.error: An error occurred while generating content.

layoutTab.title: Book Layout
layoutTab.description: Choose a layout template to professionally format your book.

coverTab.title: Cover Design
coverTab.description: Describe the cover you envision and let the AI generate stunning options for you.
coverTab.loading: Generating covers... This can take up to a minute.
coverTab.refinePromptPlaceholder: e.g., Change the background to dark blue, make the text gold...

coverTab.refineSuggestion3: Adjust lighting for a more dramatic look

metadataTab.title: Book Metadata
metadataTab.description: Fill in the essential details for publishing on Amazon KDP. This information will help readers find your book.
metadataTab.subtitle: Subtitle
metadataTab.author: Author

validationTab.title: Validation & Export
validationTab.description: Review your project and check against KDP guidelines before exporting the final files.

recipesTab.title: Recipes & Exercises
recipesTab.description: Generate specific content like recipes or exercises, complete with text and images, based on your book's topic.

Describe the recipe or exercise you want to create...
e.g., 'High-protein pancakes with blueberries' or 'Push-ups for beginners'
recipesTab.selectBlock: Select a block to edit or create a new one.

archiveTab.title: Project Archive
archiveTab.description: A collection of all generated and selected assets for your project. Click 'Use' to apply an archived item to your current project.
